item.description:
Jimmies of Savin Rock West Haven, CT...Established. 1925...
Best in Waterfront Dining

Well, here we are ...the holiday weekend is upon us! We're celebrating in a big way at The King Of Seafood...Jimmie's!!! If you are looking for something to do...you just found it! Come out and join us. It's delicious...it's fun...it's finally SUMMER!!!

Come satisfy your appetite with huge portions you’ll only find at Jimmies Galley. The family-owned-and-operated seafood restaurant is a West Haven institution known for its fresh seafood and huge prime rib cuts that are beyond belief. In fact, the portions at the West Haven restaurant are so big, no one leaves without a carryout (doggie) bag. Ruff-Ruff

If the weather is fine, we hope to grab space on their new patio. If not, there is plenty of space inside. Situated on the ocean, it's fun to come early and walk the boardwalk, or just people-watch. Chuck and I will be there early to put our reservation in, so feel free to join us and do your thing.

Yes, it is a little bit of a drive but so worth it! So, come on out and make a memory on Memorial Day weekend!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: JIMMIE'S OF SAVIN ROCK...The King of Seafood!!!
